summary: The course covers a comprehensive range of topics essential for information security professionals, including Security and Risk Management, Asset Security, Security Architecture and Engineering, Communication and Network Security, Identity and Access Management (IAM), Security Assessment and Testing, Security Operations, and Software Development Security. The course is designed to be hybrid, taking place both on the Bar-Ilan University campus and simultaneously via Zoom. It spans 10 sessions, each lasting 5 academic hours, held on Sundays and Wednesdays from 17:30 to 21:30. Prerequisites include five years of experience in the field and a consultation with an academic advisor. The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, an official ISC2 academy in Israel, providing prestigious training in the field of information security and cyber.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP).

COURSE OVERVIEW: בית הספר להייטק וסייבר של אוניברסיטת בר אילן, המהווה אקדמיה רשמית של ISC2 בישראל, מזמין אתכם להכשרה היוקרתית בתחום אבטחת המידע והסייבר.

PREREQUISITES: Participants are required to have five years of experience in the field and must have a consultation with an academic advisor.

COURSE SCHEDULE: The course starts on 13.11.2024. It will be held on Sundays and Wednesdays from 17:30 to 21:30. The course consists of 10 sessions, totaling 50 academic hours.

LEARNING FORMAT: The course is hybrid, taking place both on the Bar-Ilan University campus and simultaneously via Zoom.

COURSE TOPICS: The course covers the following topics:
- Security and Risk Management.
- Asset Security.
- Security Architecture and Engineering.
- Communication and Network Security.
- Identity and Access Management (IAM).
- Security Assessment and Testing.
- Security Operations.
- Software Development Security.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: To schedule an admission interview and registration, contact 052-5886002 or email esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.
